concept.title: tn (tone number)
concept.shortdesc: Description of the tn supplementary matcher.

conbody.p: The tn supplementary matcher queries the tone number of the phone. One argument is accepted denoting the allowed tones accepted, with multiple allowed values separated by a '|'. The numbers 0-9 are used to indicate tone number. If the list of tone numbers is preceeded by the word 'not' then the meaning is negated.

example.p: Search for a vowel with tone 214 \v:tone("214")
Search for vowels which do not have tone number 214 or 51\v:tone("not 214|51")
